14
15#ifndef DNS_BIT_H
16#define DNS_BIT_H 1
17
18/*! \file dns/bit.h */
19
20#include <inttypes.h>
21
22typedef uint64_t dns_bitset_t;
23
24#define DNS_BIT_SET(bit, bitset) \
25 (*(bitset) |= ((dns_bitset_t)1 << (bit)))
26#define DNS_BIT_CLEAR(bit, bitset) \
27 (*(bitset) &= ~((dns_bitset_t)1 << (bit)))
28#define DNS_BIT_CHECK(bit, bitset) \
29 ((*(bitset) & ((dns_bitset_t)1 << (bit))) == ((dns_bitset_t)1 << (bit)))
30
31#endif /* DNS_BIT_H */
32
